Room.Name: Ivory Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Ivory Way, walking in a north-south direction.
Room.LongDescription: A very low building sits on a grassy lot to the west. A sign out front proclaims it to be the "Center for Research on Anti-Gravity and Levitation." From here you can see several humans inside the building, all of whom appear to be wearing white coats and carrying clipboards.
